titleInfo.title: Rock House Holiness Church service, 1999 June 19

mods.abstract: Video recording of a service that opens with singing by Bill Pelfrey, Gene Sherbert, and James Wade followed by Billy Summerford's preaching and singing by Joyce Summerford and James Wade. Jamie Coots testifies, sings, defends signs, and preaches baptism in the name of Jesus Christ. Bill Pelfrey also preaches and Gene Sherbert testifies.

name.namePart: Hood, Ralph W. Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
